name: HUAWEI DEVICE (SHENZHEN) CO., LTD.
description: Huawei Device (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd. is a telecommunications company.
sampleDescriptions: Mr. LaPorta/LVPR has been retained to address concerns that Members of Congress, Executive branch and American businesses have about Huawei products/services being developed or manufactured in the US
